snippet: The June in Buffalo new-music festival included performance and discussion of works by Robert Beaser, Louis Andriessen, Julia Wolfe and others.
abstract: Allan Kozinn discusses the performances and lectures offered at June in Buffalo, the new-music composer festival hosted by University of Buffalo.
lead_paragraph: The June in Buffalo new-music festival included performance and discussion of works by Robert Beaser, Louis Andriessen, Julia Wolfe and others.
